/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the red brick buildings that line the sides. These buildings, with their traditional Chinese architecture, add a touch of historical charm to the otherwise modern cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of history and modernity that characterizes Beijing.
